title: Looking for spacethings
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and John Armstrong
brief_description: Jason and his dopey companion go looking for a thing from outer space. Meanwhile, a search party for the pair goes astray and Gonzo munches on a shoe. But sooner or later the spaghetti has to be cooked.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and John Armstrong
